title: Valley Cats
description: Valley Cats children's books are more than a story of adventure. Each book is a celebration of seasonal beauty and regional history, a lesson in trying new things, and a tribute to having fun. Most of all, it’s a story of friendship. Valley Cats is an engaging elementary chapter book and an ideal bedtime storybook. Children of any age will enjoy Boonie and River’s antics set amidst the beautiful backdrop of Michigan’s Upper Peninsula.
author: Gretchen Preston
